control_attributes.Control: SA-9 (4) CONSISTENT INTERESTS OF CONSUMERS AND PROVIDERS
control_attributes.control_description: The organization employs [Assignment: organization-defined security safeguards] to ensure that the interests of [Assignment: organization-defined external service providers] are consistent with and reflect organizational interests.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to employ tools for comparing newly generated versions of security-relevant hardware descriptions and software/firmware source and object code with previous versions.

Control Statement: The organization employs [Assignment: organization-defined security safeguards] to ensure that the interests of [Assignment: organization-defined external service providers] are consistent with and reflect organizational interests.
Control Name: SA-9 (4) CONSISTENT INTERESTS OF CONSUMERS AND PROVIDERS
